name: Horse Racer
description:
Gallop into a brand new adventure with your Horse!

Choose your horse, Enter the races all around the America. At the end become the champion!

REALISTIC RACING FEELING
You'll need to maintain your stamina and tempo, and energy till end of races to win!

RACE STRATEGIES
Keep your position! Feel the race tempo, find your way to glory end of the race!

HORSE PHYSICS
Run Faster to send your opponents back! Advanced physics engine powering the world!

MASSIVE REALISTIC 3D ENVIRONMENT
Real size Horse Racing Tracks with 20 different distance setup!
- 1200 m
- 1400 m
- 1600 m
- 1700 m
- 1800 m
- 1900 m
- 2000 m
- 2200 m
- 2400 m

20 UNIQUE RACE TRACKS
Saratoga Race Course, New York. ...
Arlington Park, Illinois. ...
Keeneland Race Course, Kentucky. ...
Churchill Downs, Kentucky. ...
Ruidoso Downs, New Mexico. ...
Del Mar Race Track, California. ...
Monmouth Park, New Jersey. ...
Belmont Park, Long Island, New York.

Live the dream of owning a realistic horse and join the real world of horse racing! Horse Racing 3D is the most authentic racing simulation game.

Remember to balance the speed and stamina since if your horse runs too fast the stamina will be used up very quickly. Now saddle up, steer your horse to reach the World Championships!

HD NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
Everything looks so real you will forget you’re playing a game!
•Realistic 3D Horse Racing Track
•Exciting Races And Challenges
•Smooth Touch And Tilt Control To Maneuver Your Horse Easily
•Awesome 3D Graphics And 3D Sound Effects
•Beautiful 3D Animated Horses

You will get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Horse Racer to experience the exciting horse racing !
